children.value:
To become a ploughshare, you must bend
   (your head to the earth)
   (your blade to the dirt)
   (your hilt to a shaft)
   (your cutting to clawing, and swinging to drawing)
   (your hand to the rein of oxen or men, which was unaccustomed to treacherous tools)
   (your plight to the suffering of fools.)
